review_data.title: Reasonably priced and very tasty sushi lunch
review_data.content: For a sushi place this is a very reasonably priced option in the middle of Zürich. The sushi is super freshly prepared and at lunch time they also offer a great bento box.

review_data.title: sushi ok
review_data.content: I'm not passionate for Sushi, but I ended up here with colleagues for lunch in this sushi-bar restaurant and I appreciated, good quality, fresh, average prices. People with me more sushi-expert appreciated as well the quality.

review_data.title: Comfortable place and good food!
review_data.content: I went there over lunchtime, service is quick and efficient (you place your order and once it’s ready you can go at the counter and collect it).

review_data.title: Good sushi options!

review_data.title: Good food but very smelly
